ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- if(error.errorType.asString == "APIKIT:BAD_REQUEST") (400) else if(error.errorType.asString == "APIKIT:NOT_FOUND") (404) else if(error.errorType.asString == "APIKIT:METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED") (405) else if(error.errorType.asString == "APIKIT:NOT_ACCEPTABLE") (406) else if(error.errorType.asString == "APIKIT:UNSUPPORTED_MEDIA_TYPE") (415) else (500)

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "correlationId": vars.correlationId, "statusCode": vars.httpStatus, "statusMessage": error.errorType, "description": error.detailedDescription, "timestamp": (now() as String {format : "yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss"}) }

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- if(error.errorType.identifier == "BAD_REQUEST") (400) else if(error.errorType.identifier == "NOT_FOUND" and !isEmpty(error.muleMessage.payload))(404) else if(error.errorType.identifier == "NOT_FOUND" and isEmpty(error.muleMessage.payload))(504) else if(error.errorType.identifier == "METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED") (405) else if(error.errorType.identifier == "UNAUTHORIZED" or error.errorType.identifier == "FORBIDDEN") (401) else if(error.errorType.identifier == "GATEWAY_TIMEOUT") (504) else if(error.errorType.identifier == "BAD_GATEWAY") (502) else (500)

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "correlationId": vars.correlationId, "statusCode": vars.httpStatus default 500, "statusMessage": error.errorType, "description": error.detailedDescription, "timestamp": now() as String {format : "yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss"}, }
